alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Lycoming; Sullivan; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 5:14PM EDT until July 24 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON...EASTERN LYCOMING...SULLIVAN AND CENTRAL UNION COUNTIES... At 514 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Kettle Creek Gorge to Montgomery to Sand Bridge State Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Lock Haven, Montoursville, Jersey Shore, Mifflinburg, Carroll, Muncy, Watsontown, Hughesville, Mill Hall, Montgomery and Avis. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Lock Haven and Milton-Williamsport exits, specifically from mile markers 178 to 210. This includes Interstate 180 from mile markers 9 to 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
